get.description: Get all available task types that the assistant can handle.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Available task types returned

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.description: Get a list of assistant tasks for the current user.

parameters.name: taskTypeId
parameters.description: Task type id. If null, tasks of all task types will be retrieved

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: User tasks returned

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.description: Parse and extract text content of a file (if the file type is supported)

filePath.description: Path of the file to parse in the user's storage

fileId.description: Id of the file to parse in the user's storage

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Text parsed from file successfully

400.description: Parsing text from file is not possible

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.summary: Get the notification request for a task when it has finished
get.description: Does not need bruteforce protection since we respond with success anyways as we don't want to keep the front-end waiting. However, we still use rate limiting to prevent timing attacks.

parameters.name: ocpTaskId
parameters.description: ID of the target task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Task notification request retrieved successfully

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.summary: Notify when the task has finished
post.description: Does not need bruteforce protection since we respond with success anyways as we don't want to keep the front-end waiting. However, we still use rate limiting to prevent timing attacks.

parameters.name: ocpTaskId
parameters.description: ID of the target task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Ready notification enabled successfully

401.description: Current user is not logged in

delete.summary: Cancel an existing notification when a task has finished
delete.description: Does not need bruteforce protection since we respond with success anyways as we don't want to keep the front-end waiting. However, we still use rate limiting to prevent timing attacks.

parameters.name: ocpTaskId
parameters.description: ID of the target task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Ready notification deleted successfully

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.description: Upload an input file for a task that is being prepared

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The input file was uploaded

400.description: Impossible to upload an input file

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.summary: Get a file of the current user

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The ID of the file that is requested

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The file is returned

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.description: Get information about a file of the current user

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The file ID for which the info is requested

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The file info is returned

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.description: Save and share a file that was produced by a task

parameters.name: ocpTaskId
parameters.description: The task ID

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The file ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The file was saved and shared

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.description: Save a file that was produced by a task

parameters.name: ocpTaskId
parameters.description: The task ID

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The file ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The file was saved

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.description: Generate and get a preview of a task output file

parameters.name: ocpTaskId
parameters.description: The task ID

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The task output file ID

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Optional preview width in pixels

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Optional preview height in pixels

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The file preview has been generated and is returned

404.description: The output file is not found

303.description: Fallback to the file type icon URL

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.description: Get a real task output file

parameters.name: ocpTaskId
parameters.description: The task ID

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The task output file ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The file preview has been generated and is returned

404.description: The output file is not found

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.description: Launch a task to process a file and store the result in a new file in the same directory

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The input file ID

parameters.name: taskTypeId
parameters.description: The task type of the operation to perform

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The task has been scheduled successfully

400.description: There was an issue while scheduling the task

401.description: Current user is not logged in

put.description: Create a new chat session, add a system message with user instructions

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Chat session has been successfully created

401.description: User is either not logged in or not found

patch.description: Update the title of a chat session

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The title has been updated successfully

401.description: Not logged in

delete.description: Delete a chat session by ID

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The session ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The session has been deleted successfully

401.description: Not logged in

get.description: Get all chat sessions for the current user

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The session list has been obtained successfully

401.description: Not logged in

put.description: Add a new chat message to the session

role.description: Role of the message (human, assistant etc...)

firstHumanMessage.description: Is it the first human message of the session?

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The session list has been obtained successfully

401.description: Not logged in

delete.description: Delete a chat message by ID

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The message ID

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The session ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The message has been successfully deleted

401.description: Not logged in

get.description: Get chat messages for the session without the system message

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The session ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The max number of messages to return

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The index of the first result to return

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The message list has been successfully obtained

401.description: Not logged in

get.description: Get a chat message in a session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The session ID

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The message ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The message has been successfully obtained

401.description: Not logged in

404.description: The session or the message was not found

get.description: Schedule a task to generate a new message for a session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The session ID

parameters.name: agencyConfirm
parameters.description: Potential agency sensitive actions confirmation (1: accept, 0: reject)

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The task has been successfully scheduled

401.description: Not logged in

get.description: Delete the message with the given message ID and all following ones, then schedule a task to generate a new message for the session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The chat session ID

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The chat message ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The task has been successfully scheduled

401.description: Not logged in

get.summary: Check the status of a session
get.description: Used by the frontend to determine if it should poll a generation task status.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The chat session ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The session status has been successfully obtained

401.description: Not logged in

400.description: Task processing failed, impossible to check the related tasks

get.summary: Check the status of a generation task. The value of slow_pickup will be set to true if the task is not being picked up.
get.description: Used by the frontend to poll a generation task status. If the task succeeds, a new message is stored and returned.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The message generation task ID

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The chat session ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The task was successful, a message has been generated

417.description: The task is still running or has not been picked up yet

401.description: Not logged in

get.description: Schedule a task to generate a title for a chat session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The chat session ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: The task has been successfully scheduled

401.description: Not logged in

get.summary: Check the status of a title generation task
get.description: Used by the frontend to poll a title generation task status. If the task succeeds, the new title is set and returned.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The title generation task ID

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The chat session ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Title has been successfully generated

417.description: The task is still running or has not been picked up yet

401.description: Not logged in
